{"name": "Food Bank Network of Somerset County - North Plainfield Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Some form of personal identification and proof of residency in Somerset County - North Plainfield
* North Plainfield residents only
* Holiday Closures in 2024
Jan 1, Monday, New Year's Day

Mar 29, Friday: Good Friday
May 27, Monday: Memorial Day
June 19, Wednesday: Juneteenth
Jul 4, Thursday: Independence Day
Sep 2, Monday: Labor Day
Oct 14, Monday: Columbus Day
Nov 11, Monday: Veterans Day
Nov 28-29, Thu-Fri: Thanksgiving
Dec 25, Wednesday: Christmas

", "email": "", "url": "https://www.somersetfoodbank.org/need-help/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "11 Vermeule Place", "address_2": null, "city": "North Plainfield", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07063", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6097028, "longitude": -74.4572194}, "phones": [{"number": "(732) 560-1813", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
